name: eles.hierholzer
descr: Perform the [Hierholzer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eulerian_path#Hierholzer's_algorithm) search algorithm on the elements in the collection. This finds Eulerian trails and circuits.

fields.name: root
fields.descr: The root node (selector or collection) where the search starts.

fields.name: directed
fields.descr: A boolean indicating whether the algorithm should only go along edges from source to target (default `false`).
